view.figures

Class Positionable

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.figures.BaseFigure
      • view.figures.Positionable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LabelFigure, PlaceFigure, TransitionFigure

    public abstract class Positionable
extends BaseFigure
    superclass of all positionable Figures (Label/Transition/Place)
